basic_identity.title: Mandatory - Title of the Dataset.
basic_identity.description: Mandatory - A detailed description of the dataset and its contents.
basic_identity.version: Mandatory - Version of the dataset as a float value.
basic_identity.changelog: Optional - Description of changes made compared to the previous version of the dataset.
basic_identity.keywords: Mandatory - Minimum of 3 keywords related to this dataset in the format of a list ('keyword1', 'keyword2', 'keyword3'...)
basic_identity.license: Mandatory - Type of license under which the dataset is distributed.

author_contact_details.email: Mandatory - Email address of the author.
author_contact_details.phone: Optional - Phone number of the author.

general.data_origin: Mandatory - Indicates whether the data is ('Synthetically Generated'/ 'Naturally Obtained'/ 'Other').

synthetic_data_details.generation_method: Mandatory - Method used for generating synthetic data, if applicable.
synthetic_data_details.software_used: Mandatory - Details of any software or tools used for generating synthetic data.
synthetic_data_details.related_publications: Optional - Citations or links to publications that are directly related to the synthetic data generation.

natural_data_details.study_type: Mandatory - Type of study conducted ('Observational' / 'Experimental' / 'Clinical Trial' / 'Field Study' / 'Laboratory Study' / 'Survey Research' / 'Longitudinal Study' / 'Cross-Sectional Study' / 'Case Study' / 'Other').

experimental_setup.general_description: Mandatory - General description of the study, outlining its main objectives and methodology.
experimental_setup.instrumentation: Optional - Specific instruments and technologies used to collect the data.
experimental_setup.protocols: Optional - List any common protocols used during the experiment.
experimental_setup.study_start_date: Mandatory - Date when the experiment commenced in the form dd/mm/yyyy.
experimental_setup.study_end_date: Mandatory - Date when the experiment concluded in the form dd/mm/yyyy.

sample_information.number_of_samples: Optional - Total number of samples collected and analyzed in the study.
sample_information.sample_types: Optional - Description of the types of samples collected, such as biological tissues, environmental specimens, clinical samples, etc., including specific details when applicable.

participants.total_participants: Optional - Total number of participants involved in the study, if applicable.
participants.demographic_data: Optional - Information about the demographic characteristics of the participants (age range, gender, ethnicity, etc.).
participants.selection_criteria: Optional - Criteria used for selecting participants, including any inclusion or exclusion criteria.
participants.health_status: Optional - Health status or medical conditions of participants relevant to the study.

experimental_conditions.experiment_location: Mandatory - Location where the experiment was conducted, including specific site details and environmental conditions, if relevant.
experimental_conditions.experiment_conditions: Optional - Detailed conditions under which the experiment was performed, such as temperature, lighting, and other relevant environmental parameters.

natural_data_details.related_publications: Optional - Citations or links to publications that are directly related to the dataset's usage.

data_completion.dataset_status: Mandatory - Indicates if the dataset is final or will be further worked on ('Complete'/ 'In Progress'/ 'Abandoned & Incomplete'/ 'Other').
data_completion.future_work: Optional - Description of any planned future work or improvements to be made on the dataset.

pre_processing.raw_data: Mandatory - Is this the raw data or has it undergone any pre-processing ('Yes'/ 'No').

data_cleanliness.cleanliness_status: Mandatory - Indicates the cleanliness of the data ('Clean'/ 'Partially Clean'/ 'Unclean'/ 'N/A').
data_cleanliness.cleaning_details: Optional - Description of the cleaning process applied to the dataset (e.g., methods used, types of errors corrected).

labeling.labeled: Mandatory - Indicates whether the data is labeled ('Yes'/ 'No'/ 'N/A').
labeling.labeling_details: Optional - Description of the labeling process and the types of labels used.

data_split.train_split: Optional - Percentage of data used for training in machine learning datasets.
data_split.validation_split: Optional - Percentage of data used for validation in machine learning datasets.
data_split.test_split: Optional - Percentage of data used for testing in machine learning datasets.

dataset_usage.citation: Optional - Recommended citation for the dataset.
dataset_usage.data_usage_description: Mandatory - Description of how the data can be used, including any restrictions or guidelines.
dataset_usage.related_publications: Optional - Links or references to any papers related to the dataset's usage.

general.dataset_size: Mandatory - Size of the dataset, typically in KB.
general.average_file_size: Mandatory - Average file size across files in KB.

csv.delimiter: Mandatory - Delimiter used in CSV files ('Comma'/ 'Colon'/ 'Semicolon'/ 'Other').
csv.has_header: Mandatory - Indicates if CSV files have a header row ('Yes'/ 'No').
csv.column_names: Mandatory - List of column names in CSV files (e.g., ['column1', 'column2', 'column3']).

excel.has_macros: Mandatory - Indicates if Excel files contain macros ('Yes'/ 'No').
excel.average_sheets: Mandatory - Average number of sheets across Excel files.

image.average_resolution: Mandatory - Average resolution across image files in Mega Pixels.
image.image_processing: Optional - Description of any image processing applied (e.g., normalization, augmentation).

video.average_duration: Mandatory - Average duration across video files in Minutes.
video.video_resolution: Mandatory - Average resolution across video files ('Lower than SD'/ 'SD'/ 'HD'/ 'Full HD'/ '2K'/ '4K'/ '8K'/ 'Greater than 8K').
video.video_processing: Optional - Description of any video processing applied (e.g., frame extraction, stabilization).

audio.file_type: Mandatory - File type of audio files ('MP3'/ 'WAV'/ 'AAC'/ 'FLAC'/ 'OGG'/ 'Other').
audio.average_duration: Mandatory - Average duration across audio files in Minutes.
audio.average_bitrate: Optional - Average bitrate across audio files in bits per second.
audio.audio_processing: Optional - Description of any audio processing applied (e.g., noise reduction, normalization).

general_info.sequence_type: Mandatory - List of predominant sequence types in the FASTA files ('DNA'/ 'RNA'/ 'cDNA'/ 'Amino Acid'/ 'Other').
general_info.specific_species: Optional - List of the specific species or strains represented in the FASTA files.

sequencing_info.sequencing_method: Mandatory - Main sequencing technologies used ('Illumina'/ 'PacBio SMRT'/ 'Nanopore Sequencing'/ 'Sanger'/ 'Ion Torrent'/ 'Pyrosequencing'/ 'SOLiD Sequencing'/ 'Other').
sequencing_info.coverage_depth: Optional - Average depth of coverage, crucial for assessing data quality as an Integer.
sequencing_info.assembly_details: Optional - Description of assembly algorithms and parameters used in generating the genome assembly.
sequencing_info.error_rate: Optional - Estimated error rate of the sequence data as a percentage (Float).

further_source_details.source_organism_info: Optional - Detailed information on the source organisms used, including any unique genetic or phenotypic characteristics. This includes both naturally occurring and engineered traits.
further_source_details.NCBI_Taxonomy_ID: Optional - The National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) Taxonomy IDs, if applicable.
further_source_details.GenBank_Accession_Number: Optional - The GenBank accession number associated with the genomic sequences of the organisms, if applicable.
further_source_details.UniProt_ID: Optional - The Universal Protein Resource (UniProt) IDs, if applicable.

general_info.sequence_type: Mandatory - List of predominant sequence types in the FASTA files ('DNA'/ 'RNA'/ 'cDNA'/ 'Amino Acid'/ 'Other').
general_info.specific_species: Optional - List of the specific species or strains represented in the GenBank files.

sequencing_info.sequencing_method: Mandatory - Main sequencing technologies used ('Illumina'/ 'PacBio SMRT'/ 'Nanopore Sequencing'/ 'Sanger'/ 'Ion Torrent'/ 'Pyrosequencing'/ 'SOLiD Sequencing'/ 'Other').
sequencing_info.coverage_depth: Optional - Average depth of coverage, crucial for assessing data quality as an Integer.
sequencing_info.assembly_details: Optional - Description of assembly algorithms and parameters used in generating the genome assembly.
sequencing_info.error_rate: Optional - Estimated error rate of the sequence data as a percentage (Float).

further_source_details.source_organism_info: Optional - Detailed information on the source organisms used, including any unique genetic or phenotypic characteristics. This includes both naturally occurring and engineered traits.
further_source_details.NCBI_Taxonomy_ID: Optional - The National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) Taxonomy IDs, if applicable.
further_source_details.GenBank_Accession_Number: Optional - The GenBank accession number associated with the genomic sequences of the organisms, if applicable.
further_source_details.UniProt_ID: Optional - The Universal Protein Resource (UniProt) IDs, if applicable.

matlab.matlab_version: Mandatory - Version of MATLAB used to generate the data (e.g., R2019b).
matlab.variables_stored: Mandatory - Types of variables stored in the file ('Matrix', 'Cell Array', 'Structure', 'Table', 'Function Handle', 'Time Series', 'Other').
matlab.toolboxes_used: Optional - List of MATLAB toolboxes used in the data generation process.

text.encoding: Mandatory - Character encoding used in text files ('UTF-8'/ 'UTF-16'/ 'UTF-32'/ 'ASCII'/ 'Other').
text.language: Mandatory - Predominant language of text files (e.g., English, Spanish, Chinese).

pdf.text_extractable: Mandatory - Indicates whether text is extractable across PDF files ('Yes'/ 'No'/ 'N/A').
pdf.pdf_version: Optional - Version of PDF format used (e.g., 1.4, 1.7).

ethics.data_collection_ethics: Optional - Information on ethical considerations related to data collection (e.g., consent, privacy).
ethics.data_usage_ethics: Optional - Information on ethical considerations related to data usage (e.g., intended use, potential misuse).
ethics.ethical_review_status: Optional - Information on whether the dataset has undergone ethical review (e.g., approved, pending, not applicable).
